name: The Flesh
movement: walk, climb, and swim at 30 feet
description: The Flesh is a Medium-sized aberration with a grotesque and malleable body, capable of adapting its form.
memorable: Its ability to regenerate unless damaged by acid or fire makes it relentlessly challenging.
goals: It typically preys on humanoids and beasts, using its Mimicry to deceive and ambush.
relations: It can encounter humanoid creatures and beasts, as it often consumes them to transform.
environment: Commonly found in areas where it can blend into both land and water environments.
strengths: High Strength score enhances its melee damage capabilities and adaptability through its special abilities.
weaknesses: Not very intelligent and requires specific conditions to be killed.
attacks: Multiattack feature allows two Slam attacks or two Manipulate Flesh actions, which are devastating and versatile.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration trait allows it to regain hit points unless it has taken acid or fire damage.
skills: It has limited perception with a passive score of 11, which restricts its ability to notice hidden threats.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water due to Amphibious trait.
Amorphous ability allows squeezing through tight spaces.
Mimicry enables it to imitate sounds heard from other creatures.
Can consume corpses to assume their forms and characteristics.
Requires a specific method to die, making it persistently difficult to defeat.
test_queries: monster with regeneration and mimicry abilities
